duties_responsibilities.duty: Investigate and resolve complaints, grievances, and member appeals based on regulatory requirements.
Prepare Maximus packets, State Fair Hearing packets, and coordinate and participate in State Fair Hearings.
Monitor emails and shared mailboxes to ensure timely processing of cases.
Identify areas for process improvement and communicate recommendations to management.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required. Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration/Management or a related field preferred.
